messages.message: Hey, I'm Lauren and I'm from Irvine, CA (about 1/2 hour south of disneyland)  I'll be in marching band as a freshman next year, too! I was wondering what you played, hope to hear from you!

Brian
Hi, I play trumpet, but I haven't practiced all summer so i can't really say that I play it.  What do you play?

i play piccolo. loud and high. i havent practiced all summer either because i had to turn it back in to my high school. mine was stolen the day before a comp. last fall but i'm buying a new one next week!

do you know if we need to bring our own marching shoes? i doubt it but i'm not sure.

hope your having a great summer!

Brian
Hey Lauren I hope you are having a great summer also.  See you back at school!  Only 6 more weeks for a wonderful summer break
